Name: VENDORID
Description: Unique ID for the vendor. Required if company does not use document sequencing, or you can provide a value to use instead of the document sequence value.

Name: NAME
Description: Name

Name: DISPLAYCONTACT
Description: Contact info

Name: STATUS
Description: Status. Use active for Active or inactive for Inactive (Default: active)

Name: ONETIME
Description: One time. Use false for No, true for Yes. (Default: false)

Name: HIDEDISPLAYCONTACT
Description: Exclude from contact list. Use false for No, true for Yes. (Default: false)

Name: VENDTYPE
Description: Vendor type ID

Name: PARENTID
Description: Parent vendor ID

Name: GLGROUP
Description: GL group name

Name: DEFAULT_LEAD_TIME
Description: Default lead time in days for replenishment purposes. Can be overridden by lead time specified on an item with that vendor, or lead time specified for on an item with a warehouse/vendor combination with that vendor. (Default: 1)

Name: TAXID
Description: Tax ID

Name: NAME1099
Description: Form 1099 name

Name: FORM1099TYPE
Description: Form 1099 type

Name: FORM1099BOX
Description: Form 1099 box

Name: SUPDOCID
Description: Attachments ID

Name: APACCOUNT
Description: Default expense GL account number

Name: OFFSETGLACCOUNTNO
Description: AP account number

Name: CREDITLIMIT
Description: Credit limit

Name: RETAINAGEPERCENTAGE
Description: Default retainage percentage for vendors. (Construction subscription)

Name: ONHOLD
Description: On hold. Use false for No, true for Yes. (Default: false)

Name: DONOTCUTCHECK
Description: Do not pay. Use false for No, true for Yes. (Default: false)

Name: COMMENTS
Description: Comments

Name: CURRENCY
Description: Default currency code

Name: CONTACTINFO
Description: Primary contact. If blank system will use DISPLAYCONTACT.

Name: PAYTO
Description: Pay to contact. If blank system will use DISPLAYCONTACT.

Name: RETURNTO
Description: Return to contact. If blank system will use DISPLAYCONTACT.

Name: CONTACT_LIST_INFO
Description: Contact list (alternative to VENDORCONTACTS). Multiple individual CONTACT_LIST_INFO elements may be passed. If this parameter and VENDORCONTACTS are both provided, VENDORCONTACTS is used. If neither are provided, any values supplied for other contacts (Primary, Pay to, or Return to) are used to create a contact list.

Name: VENDORCONTACTS
Description: Contact list (alternative to CONTACT_LIST_INFO). If this parameter and CONTACT_LIST_INFO are both provided, VENDORCONTACTS is used. If neither are provided, any values supplied for other contacts (Primary, Pay to, or Return to) are used to create a contact list.

Name: VENDOREMAILTEMPLATES
Description: Vendor email templates.

Name: VENDORACCTNOLOCATIONS
Description: Vendor location assigned account numbers (alternative to VENDOR_ACCTNO_LOC_HEAD ). If this parameter and VENDOR_ACCTNO_LOC_HEAD are both provided, VENDORACCTNOLOCATIONS is used.

Name: VENDOR_ACCTNO_LOC_HEAD
Description: Vendor location assigned account numbers (alternative to VENDORACCTNOLOCATIONS ). Multiple individual VENDOR_ACCTNO_LOC_HEAD elements may be passed. If this parameter and VENDORACCTNOLOCATIONS are both provided, VENDORACCTNOLOCATIONS is used.

Name: FILEPAYMENTSERVICE
Description: Enable direct payments to this vendor using a bank file. Choose ACH, BANKFILE, or NONE. (Default: NONE)

Name: PYMTCOUNTRYCODE
Description: Country code for a vendor. Required if the vendor is to receive bank file payments. Choose AU, ZA, or GB. (AU, GB, ZA only)

Name: VENDORBANKFILEDETAILS
Description: Vendor bank file payment details. The values you provide are validated if FILEPAYMENTSERVICE is set to BANKFILE. (AU, GB, ZA only)

Name: PROVIDERVENDORS
Description: Electronic payment providers to link to this vendor. You can also create a PROVIDERVENDOR object directly. (Early Adopter program)

Name: PAYMETHODKEY
Description: Preferred payment method

Name: MERGEPAYMENTREQ
Description: Merge payment requests. Use false for No, true for Yes. (Default: true)

Name: PAYMENTNOTIFY
Description: Send automatic payment notification. Use false for No, true for Yes. (Default: false)

Name: BILLINGTYPE
Description: Vendor billing type

Name: PAYMENTPRIORITY
Description: Payment priority

Name: TERMNAME
Description: Payment term

Name: DISPLAYTERMDISCOUNT
Description: Display term discount on check stub. Use false for No, true for Yes. (Default: true)

Name: ACHENABLED
Description: ACH enabled. Use false for No, true for Yes. (Default: false)

Name: ACHBANKROUTINGNUMBER
Description: ACH bank routing number

Name: ACHACCOUNTNUMBER
Description: ACH bank account number

Name: ACHACCOUNTTYPE
Description: ACH bank account type

Name: ACHREMITTANCETYPE
Description: ACH bank account class

Name: VENDORACCOUNTNO
Description: Vendor account number

Name: DISPLOCACCTNOCHECK
Description: Display location assigned account number on check stub. Use false for No, true for Yes. (Default: false)

Name: OBJECTRESTRICTION
Description: Restriction type. Use Unrestricted, RootOnly, or Restricted. (Default Unrestricted)

Name: RESTRICTEDLOCATIONS
Description: Restricted location IDs. Use if OBJECTRESTRICTION is Restricted. Implode multiple IDs with #~#.

Name: RESTRICTEDDEPARTMENTS
Description: Restricted department IDs. Use if OBJECTRESTRICTION is Restricted. Implode multiple IDs with #~#.

Name: ISINDIVIDUAL
Description: Specifies whether to mark the vendor as an individual person so that personally identifiable information (PII) can be masked. Use false for No, true for Yes. (Default: false) (Vendor Payments powered by CSI)
